local_intent: Compute a pull-style grasp on the dishwasher handle, execute the grasp, and verify stability
assumptions: Dishwasher handle is detectable and reachable
Yaw 90 aligns with horizontal bar handle
Gripper can achieve a stable bar grasp
coherence_with_global: Follows detect → align → set yaw → compute grasp → pick → verify, matching the global plan prior to opening the hinged door
